attributes.action:
Captain Tom Moore to be honoured by the queen.

Knighthood.
attributes.background:
Please give Captain Tom the honour he so truly deserves,  he so far has raised over £2.6 million for the NHS during this COVID-19 pandemic.

He is an inspiration to millions and he is 100 years young.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
